items.title: BEL: Is the stock a good play on higher defence spending?
items.description: The company aims to capitalise on global export opportunities, leveraging its robust product portfolio

items.title: DMart owner Avenue Supermarts' business update shows fastest store addition in any quarter
items.description: Avenue Supermarts posted its highest quarterly net store additions ever during Q4FY25, and Morgan Stanley has estimated the implied same-store sales growth (SSSG) for Q4FY25 to be at 8-9%, indicating a steady performance.

items.title: FMCG preview: Diverse growth trends, margin pressure to persist
items.description: Valuation upgrade requires sustained growth recovery, earnings support

items.title: Nuvoco Vistas becomes fifth largest cement player after NCLT nod to acquire Vadraj Cement for Rs 1,800 crore
items.description: The company had in January 2025 received a letter of intent to acquire Vadraj Cement (VCL) under insolvency process. Nuvoco has said in the past the plan to invest Rs 1800 crore for the acquisition, with addition investments planned subsequently.

items.title: Tariff Tensions: Textiles & electronics sectors eye gains, auto & jewellery await relief
items.description: India’s gems and jewellery industry is bracing for impact and so is the agriculture sector in the near-term, with the possibility of re-routing.
